name: Puppy Dog Dash - Tap My Pet First , City Rescue
name_original: Puppy Dog Dash - Tap My Pet First , City Rescue
description:
The puppies are loose! And they are having fun running free in the city park. But they need to jump over fire hydrants, hedgehogs, even smelly shoes!

HOW TO PLAY:

Tap the lower screen to jump your puppy. Jump over hairy hedgehogs and smelly shoes. Watch out for the fire hydrants! Collect gold and silver coins to unlock new characters.


EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Puppy Dog Dash’ Now!!!

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to download and play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this function.
